mapper.insert: insert into vms_member( id, nickname, pwd, phone, email) values( #{id}, #{nickname}, password(#{password}), #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: select member_id, id, phone, email, cdt from vms_member
select member_id, id, nickname, pwd, phone, email, cdt from vms_member where member_id=#{no}
select member_id, id, phone, email, cdt from vms_member where id like #{keywordPattern} or phone like #{keywordPattern} or email like #{keywordPattern}
select member_id, id, nickname, pwd, phone, email, cdt from vms_member where email=#{email} and pwd=password(#{password})
